title: Secret Outing
description:
Description :
        Tae-in, the daughter of medicine expert of the village, is said to be found by everyone when there is a problem. On the way home, a funny situation happened with a man, and Tae-in's father, who was drunk, picked the man up! The man's name was Ki-hyeon. I thought he was a foolish person. It is not normal to have the ability to quickly solve problems whenever there is an emergency. When I came to my senses, Ki-hyeon entered Tae-in's heart before I knew it... (by Google Translate)
